power.description: The namespace and ID of the power that will be triggered.
power.markdownDescription: The namespace and ID of the power that will be triggered.

type.description:
## Trigger Cooldown

---



[Entity Action Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_action_types/trigger_cooldown)

Starts the cooldown of a power that uses a [Power Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_action_types/trigger_cooldown) that has a built-in cooldown, as if that power has just been used.

Type ID: `origins:trigger_cooldown`



---

### üìù Note

Here's a list of power types that have built-in cooldowns:



    * [Action On Hit](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_action_types/trigger_cooldown)
    * [Action When Damage Taken](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_action_types/trigger_cooldown)
    * [Action When Hit](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_action_types/trigger_cooldown)
    * [Active Self](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_action_types/trigger_cooldown)
    * [Attacker Action When Hit](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_action_types/trigger_cooldown)
    * [Cooldown](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_action_types/trigger_cooldown)
    * [Fire Projectile](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_action_types/trigger_cooldown)
    * [Launch](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_action_types/trigger_cooldown)
    * [Self Action On Hit](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_action_types/trigger_cooldown)
    * [Self Action On Kill](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_action_types/trigger_cooldown)
    * [Self Action When Hit](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_action_types/trigger_cooldown)
    * [Target Action On Hit](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_action_types/trigger_cooldown)




---

### Examples

```json
"entity_action": {
  	"type": "origins:trigger_cooldown",
  	"power": "origins:launch_into_air"
}
```

This example will trigger the cooldown of the 'Gift of the Winds' (`origins:launch_into_air` (`data/origins/powers/launch_into_air.json`)) power as if the entity had used that ability.

Starts the cooldown of a power that uses a [Power Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_action_types/trigger_cooldown) that has a built-in cooldown, as if that power has just been used.

### üìù Note

    * [Action On Hit](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_action_types/trigger_cooldown)
